channel.title: Quick question about alkhirad gate

item.title: Quick question about alkhirad gate
item.dc:creator: @wicked_destiny wicked destiny
item.description:
@wicked_destiny wrote:

case 2882: if(objectX == 3268 && objectY == 3227 || objectX == 3268 && objectY == 3228 ) if (playerHasItemAmount(995, 10)==true) { deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 10); teleportToX = 3269; teleportToY = 3228; sendMessage("u went trough the gate."); } if (playerHasItemAmount(995, 10)==false) sendMessage("u need 10 coins to go trough the gate."); break;

why wont this work
the gate id = 2882

Read full topic
